name: Lemiho Cart
author: Le Minh Hoang

sections.description:
This ‘s plugin builder store online very easy . It ‘s support shortcode product, shortcode page, coupon, order, email order pro . you can manage order with function view detail very easy .
support checkout paypal and COD, security strong .

User guide video : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5A78kSozAIE

Author

Name : Le Minh Hoang
Email : lengochoang3112@gmail.com
Hotline : 0935 0932 78
Address : 194 tran ba giao street, 5 ward, go vap district, HCM city , Viet Nam
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100015561036994

Donate for me

Please trust me, we promise to develop Lemiho Cart into a strong community

All function

List functions :

  1. Shortcode product
  2. Shortcode builder store easy
  3. Support slider
  4. Responsive all device
  5. Checkout paypal and COD
  6. Coupon
  7. Order
  8. Security strong
  9. Support change text ” Add to cart “
  10. Support color style of store .
  11. Sidebar product
  12. Widgets cart
  13. Widgets search product

Unordered list:

  • Donate 3$ to me if you can .

http://lemiho.thietkewebphp.org

Demo : http://lemihocart.thietkewebphp.org

[lemiho_cart_page] => This ‘s shortcode cart page.
[lemiho_thanks_page] => This ‘s shortcode thanks page.
leminhhoang cat=”cat-slug” show=”number post ”] => This ‘s shortcode builder follow category , ex : All Product and i want show 8 product on page . i use : (  leminhhoang cat=”all-product” show=”8″ )
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/lemihocart directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Product settings->Settings of plugin comfim something sytem of Lemiho Cart
  4. Us not require pay but if you can then pay into me 3$ for version 1.0, i will support 24 / 7 ( Languages: english / Viet Nam )
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/lemihocart directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Product settings->Settings of plugin comfim something sytem of Lemiho Cart
  4. Us not require pay but if you can then pay into me 3$ for version 1.0, i will support 24 / 7 ( Languages: english / Viet Nam )

It ‘s support product review ?

No , if you want extra function product review then buy now plugin review support for Lemiho Cart of me, don’t worry it only 3$ .

I live in Viet Nam and want extra function checkout from Viet Nam , can it support ?

No , if you want extra function checkout Viet Nam then buy now plugin Lemiho Checkout support for Lemiho Cart of me, don’t worry it only 2$ .
